snippet.title: LEGO Dimensions: Supergirl Joins the Multiverse!
snippet.description:
The Multiverse just got an extra dose of girl power. The forces of evil stand no chance against Supergirl’s Super Strength, Invulnerability, and Heat Vision – and just wait until you find out what her Red Power Ring can do!  Who will she team up with and which Multiverse world will she save first? Only you can decide...

Starting in September 2016, LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ Starter Packs for the Sony PlayStation® 4 will include an exclusive, bonus DC Comics Supergirl LEGO minifigure for a limited time!

With more characters joining in on the fun, get ready for the wildest mash-ups this side of the Multiverse. Play through full-movie experiences of the year’s biggest blockbusters with immersive 6-level Story Packs, and prepare for battle in all-new Adventure World Battle Arenas where you can challenge friends in 4-player competitive split-screen. So grab your favorite characters and make room for the new ones to continue the LEGO DIMENSIONS adventure. You’re gonna need a bigger imagination!

LEGO DIMENSIONS is available now for Xbox One®, Xbox 360®, Sony PlayStation® 4, Sony PlayStation®3, and Nintendo Wii™U. Start your adventure!
http://bit.ly/getLEGODimensions

Follow us for more bricktacular Multiverse updates!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LEGODimensions
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/LEGODimensions
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LEGODimensions
